metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6560 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: [io_uring out of boundary memory access in __io_uaddr_map()]

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
